the state of the law in respect to abortion, but it is worth drawing attention



457
Weighing Factors
to the fact that in no state in this country is any man compelled by law to be
even a Minimally Decent Samaritan to any person; there is no law under
which charges could be brought against the thirty-eight who stood by while
Kitty Genovese died. By contrast, in most states in this country women are
compelled by law to be not merely Minimally Decent Samaritans, but Good
